procedure.title: The Supply and Installation of Glazing at St. Joseph's Hospital, Raheny
procedure.description:
**Title: The Supply and Installation of Glazing at St. Joseph's Hospital, Raheny**

**Description:**
Beaumont Hospital, a leading healthcare institution in Ireland, intends to appoint a suitably-qualified and experienced contractor to supply and install replacement windows at St. Joseph's Hospital, Raheny. The successful contractor will be responsible for the removal of existing windows, the preparation of existing openings (to include the making good of windowsills), the development of production drawings, and the fabrication, supply, and installation of the required windows. The contractor must have a proven track record in similar projects, demonstrating expertise in glazing solutions, project management, and compliance with health and safety standards. The contractor should also provide detailed project timelines, methodologies, and quality assurance processes. Additionally, the contractor must ensure that all work is carried out in accordance with relevant Irish building regulations and standards. The successful bidder will be expected to provide comprehensive documentation, including detailed specifications, technical drawings, and a comprehensive project plan. The contractor should also be able to demonstrate their ability to manage the project efficiently, ensuring minimal disruption to hospital operations. The proposal should include information on the contractor's experience with similar projects, their team's qualifications, and any relevant certifications or accreditations. The bidder should also provide a detailed breakdown of costs, including any warranties or maintenance services offered. The successful contractor will be required to sign a contract that includes terms and conditions specific to the project, ensuring compliance with all relevant regulations and standards. The project timeline is expected to be approximately [insert timeframe], with regular progress updates and site visits required throughout the duration of the project. The bidder should be prepared to provide a comprehensive health and safety plan, outlining measures to ensure the safety of both the contractor's team and hospital staff during the project. The proposal should also include information on the contractor's environmental policies and procedures, ensuring that the project is carried out in an environmentally responsible manner. The bidder should be able to demonstrate their ability to work collaboratively with hospital staff and other stakeholders to ensure a smooth and successful project execution. The proposal should be submitted in accordance with the guidelines outlined in the tender document, which can be accessed on the eTenders platform at [insert link]. The deadline for submission is [insert date], and late submissions will not be accepted. The evaluation criteria will include the bidder's experience, technical competence, project management capabilities, health and safety record, environmental policies, and cost competitiveness. The successful bidder will be selected based on a comprehensive evaluation of these criteria, ensuring that the best value for money is achieved for the project.
